Method Summary
 void cardsHand()
          cardsHand updates the text showing how many cards each player has in their hand
 void cardsWon()
          cardsWon updates the text showing how many cards each player has in their winnings pile
 void gameOver()
          gameOver disables the play card button when a player wins and displays the winner
static void main(String[] args)
          main method calls the GUI and plays the game of war
 void showDecks()
          showDecks updates the image for the player's hand based on the amount of cards in the pile
 void showWinnings()
          showWinnings updates the images for the winnings pile of both players based on how many cards are in the winnings pile
